docs.title: Code
docs.text:
Rendered ContentMarkdown Syntax

print("This is rendered Python code!")

`#!python3 print("This is rendered Python code!")`

docs.title: Block Quotes
docs.text:
Rendered ContentMarkdown Syntax

Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle.

The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor.

> Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle.
>
> The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor.

docs.title: Ordered Lists
docs.text:
Rendered ContentMarkdown Syntax
  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

docs.title: Unordered Lists
docs.text:
Rendered ContentMarkdown Syntax
  • Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
  • Donec vitae suscipit est
  • Nulla tempor lobortis orci
* Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
* Donec vitae suscipit est
* Nulla tempor lobortis orci

docs.title: Links
docs.text:

Link to www.example.com

[Link to www.example.com](https://www.example.com)
